title: Patch 6.7 is live!

embed.description: Greetings, Summoners. Welcome to Patch 6.7, the one where we drain some extraneous power from some top-tier picks and buff Irelia. We'd make a joke about buffing / nerfing Irelia, but the cold, hard fact is that as of this month we are net neutral on Irelia changes acrossfour years.

body:
Hi folks,

Patch 6.7 is live on Oceania.  You can read the full patch notes [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-67-notes).

We'll be watching this thread so let us know here if you encounter any strange issues today so we can check it out!

Cheers
Mindstar

replies.body:
Ever since this patch my computer keeps freezing. no error message or anything just freezes and resets. 
only when i try to play league. no idea what's wrong.
it will allow me to log in and as soon as I try to join a queue it freezes. not just league. the whole computer. and I have to reset.
